name: Claude Finance
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's finance knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's finance knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-finance (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2. Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: audit-support, close-management, financial-statements, journal-entry-prep, reconciliation, variance-analysis. Rules: income-statement.md, journal-entry.md, reconciliation.md, sox-testing.md, variance-analysis.md.
